It is an immense honor to nominate Oklahomans to our esteemed military academies.

Just back in August, I had the opportunity to meet Captain Nguyen at Fort Sill, who I nominated to West Point 9 years ago.

Students wishing to receive a Congressional nomination to a U.S. Service Academy must apply by Friday, October 13 at 5pm.

Happy 76th birthday to the United States Air Force!

Thank you to the men and women protecting our skies, especially those serving in Oklahoma at Altus Air Force Base, Vance Air Force Base, and the Air National Guard.

Frank and his family are in good spirits and are sincerely grateful to the tremendous team of doctors, nurses, and others taking care of him.

Congressman Lucas will be back on the ranch and in the district soon and expects to make a speedy recovery.

Friday morning, Congressman Lucas was injured while working at his ranch in Roger Mills County. 

He was admitted to the University of Oklahoma Medical Center in Oklahoma City for non-life threatening injuries.
As an added bonus, Captain Nguyen, who I nominated to West Point 9 years ago, was there to greet me.

It was an honor to be back at @OfficialFtSill and meet the new Commanding General, Major General Brooks.

My father was stationed here 70 years ago, so I appreciated seeing how these great Americans are continuing to ensure our military is battle ready all these years later.
As an added bonus, Captain Nguyen, who I nominated to West Point 9 years ago, was there to greet me.

247 years ago today, our Founding Fathers set forth on a journey that would change the world.

Join me today in celebrating the values they set in stone: Life, Liberty, and the Pursuit of Happiness!

Through our many investments in development, OK-03 plays a pivotal role in advancing U.S. interests abroad.

Yesterday, the House of Representatives voted to PASS the Limit, Save, Grow Act.

@HouseGOP has put forth a plan representative of the people we serve. Now Washington must act to cut wasteful spending, lift the debt ceiling, and return our fiscal house to order.

America's national debt is unsustainable and a symptom of Washington‚Äôs fiscal irresponsibility- but it‚Äôs not unfixable. 

@HouseGOP's Limit, Save, Grow Act is a responsible first step that reins-in and limits future federal spending, saves taxpayer dollars, and grows the economy.

On April 19th, 1995 at 9:02 a.m., Oklahoma was forever scarred by an act of evil.

Just as I do every April 19th, I pray for the children, mothers, fathers, and neighbors who are no longer with us and all those whose lives were forever changed.

My belief is that NOAA‚Äôs mission and its important role in research and development warrant a placement outside of @CommerceGov.

The NOAA Organic Act enables NOAA to be a modern, flexible agency that provides timely and impactful services to Americans.
science.house.gov/2023/4/cha‚Ä¶

The NOAA Organic Act establishes NOAA as an independent agency, refocusing the work on its core mission.

From weather prediction to environmental observations, NOAA‚Äôs work is critical. It‚Äôs high time we enshrine its mission in law and stand it up as an independent agency.

This morning @housescience will hold a hearing on establishing NOAA as an independent scientific agency. 

Despite being established in 1970, @NOAA has never been authorized in statue.
